statements: DELETE FROM trade_execution_optimization WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_type = 'BUY';
DELETE FROM trade_execution_optimization WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND order_status = 'Open';
DELETE FROM Trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_quantity < 500
DELETE FROM orders WHERE side = 'BUY' AND order_quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE side = 'BUY' AND order_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
